sentences.sContent: Work with the best of intentions and gain your self respect from that.
sentences.sContent_eng: Work with the best of intentions and gain your self respect from that.
sentences.sCn: 带着最好的意图工作并从中获得你的自我尊重吧。

sentences.sContent: If our self respect is based on the praise of others then our self respect will be very tenuous.
sentences.sContent_eng: If our self respect is based on the praise of others then our self respect will be very tenuous.
sentences.sCn: 如果我们的自我尊重建立在他人的表扬之上，那么这种自我尊重将是非常脆弱的。
